item.title: Hyatt Place Phuket, Patong is the inaugural Hyatt Place in Southeast Asia
item.description:
Hyatt and Boutique Corporation have announced the launch of the Hyatt Place Phuket, Patong in Phuket, Thailand. This 161-room beachfront property is the first Hyatt Place hotel in Southeast Asia. It embodies the Hyatt Place brand’s relaxed style and offers convenient amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi and 24/7 dining options. “Thailand remains a crucial market for Hyatt, and Phuket is a top tourist spot in Southeast Asia with rising demand from both leisure and business travelers,” said David Udell, Group President – Asia Pacific, Hyatt Hotels Corporation...

item.title: Get in shape for the beach at Kata Rocks in Phuket with New Year workouts in 2015
item.description:
Kata Rocks, a luxurious and modern resort in Phuket, has introduced a New Year’s fitness program designed to help guests achieve their “beach body” goals. The program, which costs THB10,000 (US$305) per day, takes place at one of Thailand’s most advanced fitness centers. It’s overseen by Callum McGregor, an accomplished personal trainer and former British special forces Commando.
